summary.name: Thomas Binu
summary.description: Lead mobile developer with 3+ years of experience specializing in GIS mapping applications. Strong programming skills and a firm grasp on UX design principles, with a proven track record of successfully delivering 7+ android projects for government entities in the middle east.

skill_table.name: Languages
skill_table.value:
Most experienced with Java and Javascript Some experience with C++, Objective C, PHP
Familiar with Python, Swift, C#

skill_table.name: Frameworks
skill_table.value: Android Development Tools, Esri ArcGIS platform, Nokia HERE Platform, Node.js, Gradle Build System, JQuery Mobile

skill_table.name: Programming Concepts
skill_table.value: Model-View-Controller, Object-Relational-Mapping, RESTful Programming, Thread Scheduling, Dependency Injection

skill_table.name: Applications
skill_table.value: Android Studio, WebStorm, Eclipse, Visual Studio, XCode, Adobe Photoshop, MATLAB, AutoCAD

description: Engage in end-to-end android development entailing concept, design, build, deploy, test, release to Play Store and support services.
Specialist in development of map driven applications using Esri ArcGIS Platform & Nokia Here Platform.
Collaborating with the client, senior management and functional managers to plan, execute and deliver projects.
Conducting workshops in Android Development and Mobile Mapping Technologies.
Delegating projects tasks and supervising team members to ensure timely completion and delivery of project.
Training and mentoring interns on various areas and assigning them tasks and duties based on their suitability to the project.

publications.name: WEB APPLICATION FOR UNIVERSITY INTERNSHIP PROGRAM MANAGEMENT
publications.description: Software designed to manage the different aspects of an internship program in a university. It includes a faculty portal to evaluate the students’ academic progress throughout the semester, review project reports and generate internship transcript, and a student portal to submit company preferences and track academic progress. An administration portal is also available to control the end-to-end working of the software and oversee the entire process.
